tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leads (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  interests VARCHAR(255),
  behavior VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE leads_demographics (
  lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(255),
  lead_email VARCHAR(255),
  lead_age INT,
  lead_gender VARCHAR(10),
  lead_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE leads_behavior (
  behavior_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_id UUID,
  behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
  behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  behavior_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE leads_demographics (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE leads_interests (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interest_1 VARCHAR,
    interest_2 VARCHAR,
    interest_3 VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE leads_behavior (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visit_count INT,
    purchase_count INT,
    last_purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LeadDemographics (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    campaign_id INT,
    lead_id INT,
    conversion_status BOOLEAN,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT
);
